Events.title: Data to Decisions: Powering Bharatâ€™s AI Revolution
Events.summary: A new initiative called "Data to Decisions" is powering India's AI revolution, particularly in Bharat. The initiative is focused on leveraging data to drive decision-making and is based in Bangalore. This effort aims to propel India's growth in the field of artificial intelligence.

Major AI Developments.title: Agentic AI to drive autonomous enterprise by 2026, human role to shift to orchestration: Wipro CTO
Major AI Developments.summary: Agentic AI is expected to drive autonomous enterprise by 2026, according to Wipro's CTO. This shift will fundamentally change the human workforce's relationship with technology, with AI gaining autonomy. The human role will evolve from execution to orchestration as a result of this transition.
